EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to meeting at Scottish VMUG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
It was a pleasure to meet you at the VMUG in Glasgow on 9th May. As Barry Howard outlined during his breakout session, VMTurbo reduces the costs and risks associated with virtualization / cloud initiatives by delivering a different approach <http://bit.ly/10Iu9kd> to managing virtualized IT.
Our philosophy is focused on achieving software-defined control to maintain the environment in an optimal state, think of it like a virtual health check, so that you can experience fewer incidents, achieve higher density, and deliver projects in less time and with better certainty of performance and efficiency. You can check out this paper <http://bit.ly/Z19QCA> for more detail, you can also download our free edition here <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM> or we’d be happy to arrange a 1:1 webinar with you, just let us know!
Kind regards The VMTurbo Team Phone: (+44) 1252.761.368
